game.name: Total War: ROME II - Blood & Gore
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Experience the violent horror of the ancient world battlefield with Total War: ROME II Blood & Gore DLC. Blood & Gore brings the savagery of front-line combat to viscera-splattering life with decapitations, dismemberment and devastating impalements.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience the violent horror of the ancient world battlefield with Total War: ROME II Blood & Gore DLC. Blood & Gore brings the savagery of front-line combat to viscera-splattering life with decapitations, dismemberment and devastating impalements.
